featured.text: Cod skin, for example, is made into calcium supplement and energy drinks, and even as material for skin transplantation as in Oddsson’s case.

definition.zh_def: 補充物，通常用於增強或改善健康或營養的產品。
definition.en_def: Something added to complete or enhance something else, often used in the context of health or nutrition.
definition.example: She takes a vitamin supplement every morning to improve her health.
